SELECT T.UUID as "id", T.APPLY_NUMBER as "applyNumber", TO_CHAR(T.CREATE_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "applyTime", D.DEPTID as "applyDeptId", D.DEPTNAME as "applyDept", TO_CHAR(T.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as "stateDate", TO_CHAR(T.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as "endDate", T.CONTACT_USER as "contactUser", T.CONTACT_PHONE as "contactPhone", T.STATUS as "status", DIR.NAME as "statusName", T.APPLY_ID as "applyId", AY.APPROVE_ID as "approveId", TO_CHAR(AP.CREATE_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as "submitDate" FROM (SELECT TB.*, ROWNUM AS ROWNO FROM (SELECT TA.*,AP1.ID FROM TB_YSZX_IDEA TA LEFT JOIN TB_WL_APPLY AY1 ON AY1.ID = TA.APPLY_ID AND AY1.VALID = '1' LEFT JOIN TB_WL_APPROVE AP1 ON AP1.ID = AY1.APPROVE_ID AND AP1.VALID = '1' LEFT JOIN TB_WL_AUDIT_USER AU ON AU.APPROVE_ID = AP1.ID AND AU.VALID = '1' LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_DEPT D2 ON D2.DEPTID = TA.APPLY_DEPT WHERE TA.VALID = '1' AND AP1.ID IS NOT NULL AND AP1.AUDIT_FLAG = '1' AND AP1.APPROVE_STATUS = '0' AND AU.APPROVE_USER = #{userId}
AND TA.APPLY_NUMBER like '%'||#{applyNumber}||'%'
AND D2.DEPTNAME like '%'||#{applyDept}||'%'
AND TA.CONTACT_USER like '%'||#{contactUser}||'%'
ORDER BY AP1.CREATE_TIME DESC) TB WHERE #{page_end} >= ROWNUM) T LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_DEPT D ON D.DEPTID = T.APPLY_DEPT LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_DATADICTIONARY DIR ON DIR.PCODE = 'YSZX_APPROVE_STATE' AND DIR.VAILD = 1 AND DIR.CODE = T.STATUS LEFT JOIN TB_WL_APPLY AY ON AY.ID = T.APPLY_ID LEFT JOIN TB_WL_APPROVE AP ON AP.ID = AY.APPROVE_ID WHERE T.ROWNO > #{page_start} AND T.VALID = '1'

SELECT T.UUID as "id", T.APPLY_NUMBER as "applyNumber", TO_CHAR(T.CREATE_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "applyTime", D.DEPTID as "applyDeptId", D.DEPTNAME as "applyDept", TO_CHAR(T.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as "stateDate", TO_CHAR(T.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as "endDate", T.CONTACT_USER as "contactUser", T.CONTACT_PHONE as "contactPhone", T.STATUS as "status", DIR.NAME as "statusName", T.APPLY_ID as "applyId", AY.APPROVE_ID as "approveId", TO_CHAR(AP.APPROVE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as "approveDate" FROM (SELECT TB.*, ROWNUM AS ROWNO FROM (SELECT TA.*,AP1.ID FROM TB_YSZX_IDEA TA LEFT JOIN TB_WL_APPLY AY1 ON AY1.ID = TA.APPLY_ID AND AY1.VALID = '1' LEFT JOIN TB_WL_APPROVE AP1 ON AP1.ID = AY1.APPROVE_ID AND AP1.VALID = '1' LEFT JOIN TB_WL_AUDIT_USER AU ON AU.APPROVE_ID = AP1.ID AND AU.VALID = '1' LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_DEPT D2 ON D2.DEPTID = TA.APPLY_DEPT WHERE TA.VALID = '1' AND AP1.ID IS NOT NULL AND AP1.AUDIT_FLAG = '1' AND AP1.APPROVE_STATUS = '1' AND AU.APPROVE_USER = #{userId}
AND TA.APPLY_NUMBER like '%'||#{applyNumber}||'%'
AND D2.DEPTNAME like '%'||#{applyDept}||'%'
AND TA.CONTACT_USER like '%'||#{contactUser}||'%'
ORDER BY AP1.APPROVE_DATE DESC) TB WHERE #{page_end} >= ROWNUM) T LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_DEPT D ON D.DEPTID = T.APPLY_DEPT LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_DATADICTIONARY DIR ON DIR.PCODE = 'YSZX_APPROVE_STATE' AND DIR.VAILD = 1 AND DIR.CODE = T.STATUS LEFT JOIN TB_WL_APPLY AY ON AY.ID = T.APPLY_ID LEFT JOIN TB_WL_APPROVE AP ON AP.ID = AY.APPROVE_ID WHERE T.ROWNO > #{page_start} AND T.VALID = '1'

SELECT T.IDEAID, TO_CHAR(wm_concat(T.USERNAME)) USERNAME FROM (SELECT V.IDEAID, V.USERNAME, V.SORT_ID FROM TB_YSZX_VISIT V WHERE V.VALID = '1'
AND V.IDEAID in (${ids})
ORDER BY V.IDEAID, V.SORT_ID) T GROUP BY T.IDEAID

SELECT T.IDEAID, TO_CHAR(wm_concat(T.USERNAME)) USERNAME FROM (SELECT C.IDEAID, NVL(CU.USERALIAS, CL.USERALISA) USERNAME FROM TB_YSZX_COMPANY_LEADER C LEFT JOIN TB_YSZX_CONFIG_COMPANY_LEADER CL ON CL.ID = C.USERID LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_USER CU ON CU.USERID = CL.USERID WHERE C.VALID = '1'
AND C.IDEAID in (${ids})
ORDER BY C.IDEAID, CL.SORTID) T GROUP BY T.IDEAID

SELECT T.IDEAID, TO_CHAR(wm_concat(T.USERNAME)) USERNAME FROM (SELECT C.IDEAID, CU.USERALIAS USERNAME FROM TB_YSZX_COMPANY_USER C LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_USER CU ON CU.USERID = C.USERID LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_DEPT D ON CU.HRDEPTCODE = D.DEPTCODE WHERE C.VALID = '1'
AND C.IDEAID in (${ids})
ORDER BY D.SORT_ID,CU.SORT_ID,CU.HRCODE) T GROUP BY T.IDEAID
